title: Gravitational Wave Detection and Data Analysis
desc: Explores gravitational wave detection across frequency bands, from CMB polarization to LIGO, and explains interferometer physics.

title: Interferometer Noise Sources and Quantum Noise
desc: Analyzes Advanced LIGO's noise composition, focusing on quantum, thermal, and technical noise sources affecting gravitational wave detection.

title: Statistical Mechanics Homework Solutions
desc: Deriving state equations and tension changes using thermodynamic coefficients and differential calculus.

title: Math Physics Equations Homework Solutions
desc: Solving integrals with Bessel functions and proving trigonometric identities using generating functions.

title: Gravitational Wave Metric Tensor Calculation
desc: Script calculates metric tensor components in TT gauge for a rotating carbon fiber column source and estimates its critical angular velocity.

title: Feynman Diagrams for Beginners
desc: An introductory guide to Feynman diagrams and QED calculations, with exercises and computer-aided examples.

title: C++ Programming Fundamentals and Keywords
desc: An overview of C++ programming basics, focusing on essential keywords categorized by function.

title: Python Escape Characters Guide
desc: Learn essential Python escape characters like \n and \t for formatting strings and handling special symbols effectively.

title: Advanced Calculus: Taylor's Theorem Review
desc: Explores Taylor's Theorem with Peano, Lagrange, and Cauchy remainder forms for function approximation.

title: Advanced Calculus Series Convergence Analysis
desc: A technical analysis of six infinite series convergence tests using comparison, ratio, and root tests.
